#summary Alert Settings.

= Alert Settings =

Here you could choose the Alert Settings and also customize the played Alertsound. Per default he uses Siren.wav for all Cases.

To change the Soundfile click to the Button leftsided of the Textboxes and choose your favourite Wave Soundfile.

=== Found Mob ===
This soundfile is played if he founds a hunted Mob, Figurine or Nest
=== Wisper ===
This soundfile is played if somebody wispers you (it also alerts on Battlenet Wispers and GM Wispers)
=== Guild ===
This soundfile is played if you received a Guildmessage or Officersmessage 
=== Attention ===
  * He will always play siren.wav if you found Aeonaxx, to alert you.
  * He will also use siren.wav if your Toon gets an Unautorized Continent Change or another security concealment
